mapper.sql: id, topic_id, user_id, context, picture, reply_time, status, storey, logic_delete_flag
mapper.select: select r.id as id,r.topic_id as topicId,r.user_id as userId, r.context as context ,r.picture as picture,r.reply_time as replyTime,r.likenum as likenum, r.status as status ,r.storey as storey,u.username as username, u.exp as exp,u.head as head ,(select count(*) from comment where comment.reply_id=r.id) as count from user as u,reply as r where u.id=r.user_id and r.topic_id=#{topicid} and r.logic_delete_flag=0 and u.logic_delete_flag=0 order by r.storey
select max(storey) from reply where topic_id=#{topicId}
